mapper.update:
update plc_member
member_code = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mem_name = #{memName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_eng = #{nameEng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
name_parents = #{nameParents,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
centre = #{centre,jdbcType=INTEGER},

marketing = #{marketing,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update plc_member set member_code = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_name = #{memName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_eng = #{nameEng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, name_parents = #{nameParents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, centre = #{centre,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refer_from = #{referFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marketing = #{marketing,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from plc_member WHERE centre = #{centreCode} ORDER BY convert(mem_name using gbk) collate gbk_chinese_ci
select count(1) from plc_member where member_code = #{memberCode}
